title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 571.0 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 571.0 - Definitions

State Regulations

For purposes of this Part, the following are defined
as: (a) Employee. All officers, full-time and part-time faculty and staff employed by the college, the college
association, the college foundation, and the State University Research

Foundation. (Exception: resident assistants, student managers or student
workers are not employees.)
(b) Student. All individuals registered in a full-time or part-time course of
study. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
571.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
